Posted By: Brian Collie
I won this item last night and then a few hours later won an SGC 60.  As such I am looking to trade this for a PSA 4 / SGC 50 HOF I need or some commons.  Let me know if interested.  Would prefer trade but will sell at the cost I paid + shipping.  Thanks,  Brian
